issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
As per the docs there could be an _addPolygons_ method. 
This is present and fully working on iOS but on Android we can only [add one polygon at time|https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.map/blob/master/android/src/ti/map/ViewProxy.java#L722].
fields.summary: Android - Module ti.map doesn't expose addPolygons method
